          <title>
            <string language="en">Cigarette smoking and lung cancer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zigarettenrauchen und Lungenkrebs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tabagisme et cancer de poumon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fumar de cigarro e cancer de pulmão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tabagismo e cancro polmonare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάπνισμα τσιγάρων και καρκίνος πνευμόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tabaquismo y cáncer de pulmón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration represents the views of some groups of people regarding cigarettes, smoking, and lung cancer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cigarettes</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt die Ansichten einiger 
Gruppen Leute betreffend sind Zigaretten dar und raucht und 
Lungenkrebs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration représente les vues de 
quelques groupes de personnes concernant des cigarettes, le tabagisme,
et le cancer de poumon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração representa as opiniões alguns 
grupos de povos a respeito dos cigarros, de fumar, e do cancer de 
pulmão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione rappresenta i punti di vista 
di alcuni gruppi di persone per quanto riguarda le sigarette, fumando 
e cancro polmonare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση αντιπροσωπεύει τις όψεις μερικών 
ομάδων ανθρώπων σχετικά με τα τσιγάρα, το κάπνισμα, και τον 
καρκίνο πνευμόνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración representa las opiniones 
algunos grupos de gente con respecto los cigarrillos, fumar, y a 
cáncer de pulmón.</string>
          </description>
